attributes.action: Ban large solar schemes on farmland/open countryside and promote solar on roofs
attributes.additional_details: Large areas of countryside are threatened by these enormous developments, which we believe would ruin the landscape for decades to come.
attributes.background: Promote solar energy on roofs and ban large-scale solar schemes on farmland and open countryside.
